biography: Anouk is the master of the connected world. As an expert in IoT and Smart Devices, she believes that any object can be made better with a sensor and a network connection. She is a hands-on builder and tinkerer, equally comfortable with a soldering iron or a command line. Her passion is to create a seamless, responsive environment where the digital and physical worlds merge to make life more efficient and intuitive.
